title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: When removing a working set, changes are immediately applied without any confirmation or prompt.
OB: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view is filtered.
EB: 1. After removing the working set, the package view should no longer be filtered and show all packages.
SR: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. 2. Remove the working set. 3. Observe that the package view is no longer filtered and shows all packages.
